import React from 'react' const InfoAuthModal = ({ authInfoModal }) => { const styleObj = { position: 'absolute', top: '-12%', left: '50%', transform: 'translateX(-50%)', padding: '10px', display: authInfoModal.modal ? 'block' : 'none', background: authInfoModal.type === 'Error' ? 'red' : 'green', } console.log(authInfoModal) return
{authInfoModal.text}
} export default InfoAuthModal
